referenceObject.reference: Guadanucci, J. P. L., Fonseca-Ferreira, R., Baptista, R. L. C. & Pedroso, D. R. (2016). An unusual new species of Trechona (Araneae: Mygalomorphae: Dipluridae), from quartzitic caves of the Diamantina Plateau, Minas Gerais, Brazil, with a key to the known species. Journal of Natural History 50(39/40): 2487-2497.
